attributes.action: The government should realise how little the public care about "Plebgate"
attributes.additional_details: The government should realise how little the public care about "Plebgate". Wasting hundreds of thousands of pounds of tax payers money on this nonsensical matter is utterly pathetic. Yes, clearly the police involved and/or the MP have acted like children but this cost to tax payers is inexcusable! Please stop wasting time and money on this and let the matter go like the adults you are meant to be!
